item.title: Create a Memorable Birthday Video for Girlfriend - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented videographer/editor to create a memorable and amazing video for my girlfriend's birthday. The video should capture the essence of our relationship and showcase our most cherished memories together. We want the video to be heartfelt, creative, and visually appealing, with a perfect blend of music and narration. You will be provided with a collection of photos and videos that you can use to create this masterpiece. We require someone with a keen eye for detail and storytelling skills. If you can add special effects or animations to enhance the video, that would be a plus. We are excited to see your portfolio and discuss ideas to make this video truly special.


Posted On: June 20, 2024 22:09 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Photo Slideshow, Graphic Design, Illustration
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Photo Slideshow, Graphic Design, Illustration

item.title: Social Media Manager & Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
I'm looking for a video editor to be in charge of the process for delivering content in the personal development niche into socials.

You'll get full length videos (for youtube - so 5-7 minutes) then be responsible for minor edits as needed for YT, but then primarily to pull out interesting sound bites into shorter clips for YT shorts/Instagram Reels/TikToks.

The main part of this role is having the eye and the ear for what makes a good self-contained sound bite in that niche.

From there, you'll put them through a caption generator and make sure it that it got the right words - then coming up with a catchy relevant title (based on the content) as well as a brief compelling description related to it, and some keywords/hashtags where relevant.

You'll be responsible for the whole workflow, from getting the original uncut video, to minor edits for YT, to cutting and captioning the videos for socials, to uploading/scheduling them.

You'll need a good eye for catchy sound bytes, and a good sense of how to word things for personal development (which we will also iterate based on how they perform plus the tone of the content).

Quick turnaround time is important, so is attention to detail, as well as ability to adapt/iterate in style or selection type & the types of descriptions/titles based on creative direction. Ideally you also bring suggestions to the table on how to improve based on your experience & creative ability.

This is not intense editing - most of the work is in finding the right content to select, then making sure the text is right (from the caption generator plus making titles/descriptions/keywords). As we go on, there may be more required like different kinds of cuts/transitions within individual content pieces. We don't anticipate significant if any color grading required for any of this. Most content will come pre-graded, some bits may require a very small amount of adjustment.

Additionally, occasionally we will also have longer form YT videos (which will also be used for more social clips) that need to be edited in a slightly more involved way.

As attention to detail is important, please begin your message with the following sentence: "I've got [no/little/plenty] experience cutting videos for social shorts, my preferred tool for generating captions is (X) because (Y), and here is a sample of at least 5 shorts clips I've made, including their source videos: Z". Please make the following changes to the sentence: (a) in the set of options in the square brackets, select only the one option that applies to you, delete the others, and the square brackets, but keep the respective slashes, (b) fill in X and Y respectively, keeping the parenthesis around your answers (feel free to explain as much as you'd like) and (c) send through links to either the live social media videos (can be any platform) or the video files themselves, and for each short video make sure to reference its source and the timestamp.


Posted On: June 20, 2024 21:53 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Explainer Video, Footage-Based Video, Instagram Reels, Instagram Story, Promotional Video, Narrative Video, Dialogue Editing, Video Cleanup, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Explainer Video, Footage-Based Video, Instagram Reels, Instagram Story, Promotional Video, Narrative Video, Dialogue Editing, Video Cleanup, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for a Video Editor. I run a small YouTube channel for Real Estate here in the U.S.

My Editor is taking a break and took a job.

I typically pay 70-110 bucks per video depending on length (5-15 minutes) and can do bulk orders. I plan on making 50-plus videos with this editor a year hopefully more. This included Thumbnail work too.  I upload everything to google docs for you to take it from there.

If interested, I can send you a Google drive folder with some footage for you to edit and show me your editing style

Please check out my YouTube by searching Ben Quann to watch what I’m looking for .

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 20, 2024 21:43 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects

item.title: Short Video Clip Creation - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to create a short video clip for our brand. The clip will feature Dr. Ragland's Signature flashing on the screen with a captivating green electricity effect. This video will be used as a quick outro for our marketing content. The duration of the clip should be around 1-2 seconds. We require someone with expertise in video editing and motion graphics to bring this concept to life. If you have a portfolio showcasing similar work, please include it in your proposal.
Dr. James Ragland. you can use a clean cursive, yet readable font for is "signature"
  Skills required:
  - Video editing
  - Motion graphics
  - Creativity
  - Attention to detail

If you want to make one, and send it. If I like it, I'll hire you for the job and pay you for it.

Budget: $40
Posted On: June 20, 2024 21:43 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial, Adobe Premiere Pro

item.title: Training Video Creation - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a freelancer to create an engaging 8-10 minute training video using a script that we created. The goal of the video is to train or inform internal business partners on how the basics of worker classification and the underlying legal principles are crucial to our operations and the services we provide, along with a hypothetical situation to illustrate some of the concepts discussed in the first half of the video. The final cut should be in line with our brand guidelines, which will be provided.

The video should be informative and visually appealing, capturing the attention of viewers and effectively conveying the key training concepts. The project requires proficiency in the following skills:

- Video production
- Video editing
- Storytelling
- Communication
- Instructional design
- Animation

This project may require a phone call consultation meeting to align on how best to accomplish this project. We expect this to be completed within 1 week (by June 28).

Budget: $800
Posted On: June 20, 2024 21:37 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Explainer Video, Animation
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Explainer Video, Animation
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Talented Video Editor for Shorts with Fast Turnaround and High-Quality Captions - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:

We are seeking a skilled and creative video editor to join our team on a freelance basis. The ideal candidate will be experienced in editing short videos and proficient in adding high-quality captions. We need someone who can deliver polished, engaging videos with a quick turnaround time.

Responsibilities:

Edit short videos (typically 1-2 minutes in length) for various platforms such as Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube Shorts.
Add high-quality, accurate, and visually appealing captions to the videos.
Ensure the final videos are engaging, professional, and align with our brand's style and tone.
Apply any necessary color correction, sound enhancements, and other post-production elements to improve video quality.
Deliver completed videos within 24-48 hours.
Requirements:

Proven experience as a video editor, particularly with short-form content.
Strong portfolio showcasing your video editing skills and previous work with captions.
Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar.
Excellent attention to detail and ability to produce high-quality work consistently.
Ability to work efficiently and meet tight deadlines.
Strong communication skills and ability to take feedback positively.
Preferred Qualifications:

Experience editing videos for social media platforms like Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube.
Knowledge of current trends in short-form video content and social media.
Creative mindset with the ability to suggest improvements and new ideas.


Posted On: June 20, 2024 21:29 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing, Explainer Video, Video Commercial, Motion Graphics, Videography
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing, Explainer Video, Video Commercial, Motion Graphics, Videography
Country: USA
click to apply

item.title: Edit the video of a reality dating show filmed in front of an audience - Upwork
item.description:
Too Thirsty is a live show, where people date on stage. Here's the premise: On stage there are 3 guys and 1 girl. They can't see each other. She asks the questions and they do their best to impress her. Will she find her match? Not sure. Will it be awkward? Hell yes.

We are seeking someone to edit the footage from our last show into a high-value production. Something someone would watch on Netflix or YouTube as an entertaining show.

Here is the teaser from our last show:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9ba6yrKjEcA&t=3s

Here are the assets:
1. Footage from 5 cameras.
2. Audio.  

Some of the criteria for the final product:
• The edits need to be fast. Roughly every 5 seconds.
• The edits need to move camera to camera.
• The edits should generally focus on the person speaking.
• If you have ever seen Love Is Blind that would be good inspiration.
• The audio from one camera needs to be synced to the others as it is of a superior quality. The syncing needs to be PERFECT. (No mismatch between people's lips and the words coming out of their mouths).
• The audio should also be improved and be of tv quality.
• Remove all of the dead moments, where someone says 'um' or 'uh'.
• Boring conversation, comments, etc. also need to be removed.


The final product should be about 45 minutes long (or maybe less depending how much is removed) and look like this YouTube show called Updating:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IqG_jqMTUdQ

If it works out well, this could turn into a monthly gig.








Budget: $250
Posted On: June 20, 2024 21:21 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Documentary, Television, Video Editing
Skills: Documentary, Television, Video Editing
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply
